content: Nice article Elliot, thanks for sharing your experience. Like you, I’ve been interested on the 8pt grid since listening to Bryn Jackson talking about that regularly. At EDITED we’ve started using a 8pt scale as we modernise our marketing website to React. The scale we’re using has just a small difference, as we actually have a 4pt value for the first position of the scale. This is the scale we’re currently using: 4, 8, 16, 24, 32, 40, 48, 64, 80, 120 I’m preparing a few more technical posts for https://inside.edited.com/ and will definitely spend some time on this, thanks for the inspiration!
